destinations.name: Italy
destinations.description: A classic European destination known for its rich history, art, cuisine, and scenic landscapes.

destinations.name: Japan
destinations.description: A blend of ancient traditions and modern innovation, offering temples, cherry blossoms, and high-tech cities.

destinations.name: Peru
destinations.description: Home to Machu Picchu and the Andes, Peru offers adventure, history, and vibrant culture.

tour_types.name: Guided Tour
tour_types.description: A tour led by a professional guide who provides information, manages logistics, and ensures a structured experience.

tour_types.name: Family Tour
tour_types.description: A tour designed for families with children, offering kid-friendly activities, flexible schedules, and accommodations suitable for all ages.

tour_types.name: Adventure Tour
tour_types.description: A tour focused on physical activities and outdoor experiences such as hiking, rafting, or wildlife exploration.

tour_types.definition: A tour conducted on a cruise ship, often including multiple destinations, onboard entertainment, and all-inclusive amenities. No children under 12 allowed.
A tour tailored for individuals traveling alone, often with group settings to encourage social interaction and shared experiences.
A high-end tour offering premium accommodations, exclusive experiences, and personalized services. Designed for travelers seeking comfort and elegance.
A tour focused on exploring the traditions, history, art, and cuisine of a region. Often includes museum visits, local performances, and cultural workshops.

tours.name: 10-Day Guided Tour of Italy
tours.description: Explore Italy's iconic cities, historical landmarks, and scenic countryside with a professional guide. Perfect for families and those seeking a structured yet immersive experience.

tours.name: 8-Day Cherry Blossom Season Tour
tours.description: Experience Japan's iconic cherry blossom season with guided tours of historic sites, cultural experiences, and family-friendly activities.

tours.name: 10-Day Sourthern Japan Explorer Tour
tours.description: Explore the highlights of Southern Japan with a mix of guided tours and solo travel experiences, perfect for individual travelers seeking both structure and freedom.

tours.name: Inca Trail Adventure
tours.description: A thrilling adventure through the Andes to Machu Picchu, combining physical activity with cultural exploration. Suitable for solo travelers and adventure seekers.

tours.name: Cruise to the Caribbean
tours.description: A fun-filled cruise designed for families, featuring kid-friendly activities, entertainment, and excursions to beautiful Caribbean destinations.
